screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mxv file in MAGIX Movie Studio 2024
screenshot.caption: MXV file open in MAGIX Movie Studio 2024

description: When exporting video from a MAGIX application, you can choose from various presets. For example, if you select File → Export movie → Video as MAGIX Video , you can choose from many presets.
Export settings include the resolution, frame rate, and interlace mode. You can also select a specific range of the video to export if you do not want to export the entire video.
